languages.text: "Вся эта чудовищная мощь и тела, и духа настолько груба, что мне до сих пор не верится в то, что он не сломал себя".
"All that brutal, monstrous power in body and spirit — I still cannot believe he did not break under the force of it."
languages.original_text: "Вся эта чудовищная мощь и тела, и духа настолько груба, что мне до сих пор не верится в то, что он не сломал себя".

traits.locale_text: "All that brutal, monstrous power in body and spirit — I still cannot believe he did not break under the force of it."
"All that brutal, monstrous power in body and spirit — I still cannot believe he did not break under the force of it."
"All that brutal, monstrous power in body and spirit — I still cannot believe he did not break under the force of it."
"All that brutal, monstrous power in body and spirit — I still cannot believe he did not break under the force of it."
"All that brutal, monstrous power in body and spirit — I still cannot believe he did not break under the force of it."

languages.text: "All die brutale, monströse Macht in Körper und Geist — ich kann noch immer nicht glauben, dass er unter ihr nicht zusammengebrochen ist."
languages.original_text: "All that brutal, monstrous power in body and spirit — I still cannot believe he did not break under the force of it."

traits.locale_text: "All die brutale, monströse Macht in Körper und Geist — ich kann noch immer nicht glauben, dass er unter ihr nicht zusammengebrochen ist."

languages.text: « Quand je pense à toute cette puissance brute, monstrueuse qui l'a investi corps et âme... je n'arrive pas à croire qu'il ait survécu à un tel assaut de violence pure. »
languages.original_text: "All that brutal, monstrous power in body and spirit — I still cannot believe he did not break under the force of it."

traits.locale_text: « Quand je pense à toute cette puissance brute, monstrueuse qui l'a investi corps et âme... je n'arrive pas à croire qu'il ait survécu à un tel assaut de violence pure. »

languages.text: «Un poder tan brutal, en cuerpo y espíritu... No puedo creer que no se quebrantara bajo su peso».
languages.original_text: "All that brutal, monstrous power in body and spirit — I still cannot believe he did not break under the force of it."

traits.locale_text: «Un poder tan brutal, en cuerpo y espíritu... No puedo creer que no se quebrantara bajo su peso».

languages.text: 「肉体的にも精神的にも、あの残忍で怪物的な力が…彼がその力で壊れなかったことが、未だに信じ難いわ」
languages.original_text: "All that brutal, monstrous power in body and spirit — I still cannot believe he did not break under the force of it."

traits.locale_text: 「肉体的にも精神的にも、あの残忍で怪物的な力が…彼がその力で壊れなかったことが、未だに信じ難いわ」

languages.text: “他的身体与精神遭到了如此残暴、如此可怕的力量影响。我真不敢相信，他居然没有被这种力量摧毁。”
languages.original_text: "All that brutal, monstrous power in body and spirit — I still cannot believe he did not break under the force of it."

traits.locale_text: “他的身体与精神遭到了如此残暴、如此可怕的力量影响。我真不敢相信，他居然没有被这种力量摧毁。”

languages.original_text: "All that brutal, monstrous power in body and spirit — I still cannot believe he did not break under the force of it."

languages.text: "Hem bedenen hem de ruhen sahip olduğu tüm o gaddar, canavarımsı güç... Altında ezilmeden kalabildiğine hâlâ inanamıyorum."
languages.original_text: "All that brutal, monstrous power in body and spirit — I still cannot believe he did not break under the force of it."
